cause.description:
Did you know that they are building a fast train from China to Tibet in order to 'bring the tibetan people into the 21st Century). I think it's sad that a country that is so determined to kill endangered for their own health have taken over such a peaceful nation.
1. The Dalai Lama should be able to live in the country he was born in without fear
cause.mission: Get the chinese out of Tibet
cause.name: Save Tibet
